00235    * Destructor. 
00236    */
00237    template <class Interaction>
00238    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::~PairPotentialImpl() 
00239    {
00240       if (interactionPtr_) {
00241          delete interactionPtr_;
00242          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00243       }
00244    }

00246    template <class Interaction>
00247    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00248    {
00249       readBegin(in,"PairPotential");
00250       bool nextIndent = false;
00251       readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00252       readPairListParam(in);
00253       readEnd(in);
00254    }

00264    * Return pair energy for a single pair.

00266    template <class Interaction> double 
00267    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::pairEnergy(double rsq, 
00268                                         int iAtomType, int jAtomType) const
00269    { return interaction().energy(rsq, iAtomType, jAtomType); }

00293    /*
00294    * Increment atomic forces, without calculating energy.
00295    */
00296    template <class Interaction>
00297    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces()
00298    {  
00299        if (methodId() == 0) {
00300           addForcesList(); 
00301        } else
00302        if (methodId() == 1) {
00303           addForcesCell(); 
00304        } else {
00305           addForcesNSq(); 
00306        }
00307    }

00309    /*
00310    * Compute total pair energy on all processors.
00311    */
00312    template <class Interaction>
00313    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00314    void 
00315    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00316    #else
00317    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy()
00318    #endif
00319    { 
00320       double localEnergy = 0.0; 
00321       if (methodId() == 0) {
00322          localEnergy = energyList(); 
00323       } else 
00324       if (methodId() == 1) {
00325          localEnergy = energyCell(); 
00326       } else {
00327          localEnergy = energyNSq(); 
00328       }
00329 
00330       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00331       double totalEnergy = 0.0; 
00332       communicator.Reduce(&localEnergy, &totalEnergy, 1, 
00333                           MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00334       setEnergy(totalEnergy);
00335       #else
00336       setEnergy(localEnergy);
00337       #endif
00338    }
00339 
00340    /*
00341    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00342    */
00343    template <class Interaction>
00344    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyList()
00345    {
00346       Vector f;
00347       double rsq;
00348       double energy = 0.0;
00349       PairIterator iter;
00350       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00351       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00352       int    type0, type1;
00353       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00354          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00355             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00356             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00357             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00358             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00359             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00360             rsq = f.square();
00361             energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00362          }
00363       } else {
00364          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00365             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00366             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00367             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00368             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00369             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00370             rsq = f.square();
00371             if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00372                energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00373             } else {
00374                energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00375             }
00376          }
00377       }
00378       return energy;
00379    }
00380 
00381    /*
00382    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00383    */
00384    template <class Interaction>
00385    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForcesList()
00386    {
00387       Vector f;
00388       double rsq;
00389       PairIterator iter;
00390       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00391       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00392       int    type0, type1;
00393 
00394       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00395 
00396          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00397             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00398             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00399             rsq = f.square();
00400             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00401             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00402             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00403             atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00404             atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00405          }
00406 
00407       } else {
00408 
00409          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00410             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00411             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00412             rsq = f.square();
00413             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00414             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00415             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00416             atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00417             if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00418                atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00419             }
00420          }
00421 
00422       }
00423    }
00424 
00425    /*
00426    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00427    */
00428    template <class Interaction>
00429    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyCell()
00430    {
00431       // Find all neighbors (cell list)
00432       Cell::NeighborArray neighbors;
00433       Vector f;
00434       double rsq;
00435       double energy = 0.0;
00436       Atom*  atomPtr0;
00437       Atom*  atomPtr1;
00438       const Cell*  cellPtr;
00439       int    type0, type1, na, nn, i, j;
00440 
00441       // Iterate over linked list of local cells.
00442       cellPtr = cellList_.begin();
00443       while (cellPtr) {
00444          cellPtr->getNeighbors(neighbors, reverseUpdateFlag());
00445          na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00446          nn = neighbors.size();
00447          for (i = 0; i < na; ++i) {
00448             atomPtr0 = neighbors[i];
00449             type0 = atomPtr0->typeId();
00450 
00451             // Loop over atoms in this cell
00452             for (j = 0; j < na; ++j) {
00453                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00454                type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00455                if (atomPtr1 > atomPtr0) {
00456                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00457                   rsq = f.square();
00458                   energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00459                }
00460             }
00461 
00462             // Loop over atoms in neighboring cells.
00463             if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00464                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00465                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00466                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00467                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00468                   rsq = f.square();
00469                   energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00470                }
00471             } else {
00472                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00473                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00474                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00475                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00476                   rsq = f.square();
00477                   if (!atomPtr1->isGhost()) {
00478                      energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00479                   } else {
00480                      energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00481                   }
00482                }
00483             }
00484 
00485          }
00486          cellPtr = cellPtr->nextCellPtr();
00487       } // while (cellPtr) 
00488       return energy;
00489    }
00490 
00491    /*
00492    * Increment atomic forces using Cell List (private).
00493    */
00494    template <class Interaction>
00495    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForcesCell()
00496    {
00497       // Find all neighbors (cell list)
00498       Cell::NeighborArray neighbors;
00499       Vector f;
00500       double rsq;
00501       Atom*  atomPtr0;
00502       Atom*  atomPtr1;
00503       const Cell* cellPtr;
00504       int    type0, type1, na, nn, i, j;
00505 
00506       // Iterate over local cells.
00507       cellPtr = cellList_.begin();
00508       while (cellPtr) {
00509          cellPtr->getNeighbors(neighbors);
00510          na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00511          nn = neighbors.size();
00512          for (i = 0; i < na; ++i) {
00513             atomPtr0 = neighbors[i];
00514             type0 = atomPtr0->typeId();
00515             // Loop over atoms in this cell
00516             for (j = 0; j < na; ++j) {
00517                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00518                type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00519                if (atomPtr1 > atomPtr0) {
00520                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00521                   rsq = f.square();
00522                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00523                   atomPtr0->force() += f;
00524                   atomPtr1->force() -= f;
00525                }
00526             }
00527 
00528             // Loop over atoms in neighboring cells.
00529             if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00530                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00531                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00532                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00533                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00534                   rsq = f.square();
00535                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00536                   atomPtr0->force() += f;
00537                   atomPtr1->force() -= f;
00538                }
00539             } else {
00540                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00541                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00542                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00543                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00544                   rsq = f.square();
00545                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00546                   atomPtr0->force() += f;
00547                   if (!atomPtr1->isGhost()) {
00548                      atomPtr1->force() -= f;
00549                   }
00550                }
00551             }
00552 
00553          }
00554          cellPtr = cellPtr->nextCellPtr();
00555       } // while (cellPtr) 
00556    }

00558    /*
00559    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00560    */
00561    template <class Interaction>
00562    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyNSq()
00563    {
00564       Vector f;
00565       double rsq;
00566       double energy = 0.0;
00567       AtomIterator  atomIter0, atomIter1;
00568       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00569       int id0, id1, type0, type1;
00570 
00571       // Iterate over local atom 0
00572       storage().begin(atomIter0);
00573       for ( ; atomIter0.notEnd(); ++atomIter0) {
00574          id0 = atomIter0->id();
00575          type0 = atomIter0->typeId();
00576 
00577          // Iterate over local atom 1
00578          storage().begin(atomIter1);
00579          for ( ; atomIter1.notEnd(); ++atomIter1) {
00580             id1 = atomIter1->id();
00581             if (id0 < id1) {
00582                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00583                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), atomIter1->position());
00584                   rsq = f.square();
00585                   type1 = atomIter1->typeId();
00586                   energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00587                }
00588             }
00589          }
00590 
00591          // Iterate over ghost atoms
00592          storage().begin(ghostIter);
00593          if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00594             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00595                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00596                if (id0 < id1) {
00597                   if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00598                      f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00599                      rsq = f.square();
00600                      type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00601                      energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00602                   }
00603                }
00604             }
00605          } else {
00606             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00607                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00608                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00609                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00610                   rsq = f.square();
00611                   type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00612                   energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00613                }
00614             }
00615          }
00616 
00617       }
00618       return energy;
00619    }
00620 
00621    /*
00622    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00623    */
00624    template <class Interaction>
00625    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForcesNSq()
00626    {
00627       Vector f;
00628       double rsq;
00629       AtomIterator  atomIter0, atomIter1;
00630       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00631       int           type0, type1, id0, id1;
00632 
00633       // Iterate over atom 0
00634       storage().begin(atomIter0);
00635       for ( ; atomIter0.notEnd(); ++atomIter0) {
00636          id0 = atomIter0->id();
00637          type0 = atomIter0->typeId();
00638 
00639          // Iterate over local atom 1
00640          storage().begin(atomIter1);
00641          for ( ; atomIter1.notEnd(); ++atomIter1) {
00642             id1 = atomIter1->id();
00643             if (id0 < id1) {
00644                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00645                   // Set f = r0 - r1, separation between atoms
00646                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), atomIter1->position());
00647                   rsq = f.square();
00648                   type1 = atomIter1->typeId();
00649                   // Set vector force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00650                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00651                   atomIter0->force() += f;
00652                   atomIter1->force() -= f;
00653                }
00654             }
00655          }
00656 
00657          // Iterate over ghosts
00658          storage().begin(ghostIter);
00659          if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00660 
00661             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00662                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00663                if (id0 < id1) {
00664                   if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00665                      // Set f = r0 - r1, separation between atoms
00666                      f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00667                      rsq = f.square();
00668                      type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00669                      // force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00670                      f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00671                      atomIter0->force() += f;
00672                      ghostIter->force() -= f;
00673                      // Note: If reverseUpdateFlag, increment ghost force 
00674                   }
00675                }
00676             }
00677 
00678          } else {
00679 
00680             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00681                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00682                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00683                   // Set f = r0 - r1, separation between atoms
00684                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00685                   rsq = f.square();
00686                   type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00687                   // force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00688                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00689                   atomIter0->force() += f;
00690                   // Note: If !reverseUpdateFlag, do not increment ghost force 
00691                }
00692             }
00693 
00694          }
00695 
00696       }
00697    }
00698 
00699    /*
00700    * Compute total pair stress (Call on all processors).
00701    */
00702    template <class Interaction>
00703    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00704    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00705    #else
00706    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress()
00707    #endif
00708    {
00709       Tensor localStress;
00710       Vector dr;
00711       Vector f;
00712       double rsq, forceOverR;
00713       PairIterator iter;
00714       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00715       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00716       int    type0, type1;
00717 
00718       localStress.zero();
00719       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00720 
00721          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00722             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00723             dr.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00724             rsq = dr.square();
00725             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00726             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00727             f = dr;
00728             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00729             incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00730          }
00731 
00732       } else {
00733 
00734          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00735             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00736             dr.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00737             rsq = dr.square();
00738             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00739             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00740             f = dr;
00741             forceOverR = interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00742             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00743             if (atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00744                forceOverR *= 0.5;
00745             }
00746             f *= forceOverR;
00747             incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00748          }
00749 
00750       }
00751 
00752       // Normalize by volume 
00753       localStress /= boundary().volume();
00754 
00755       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00756       Tensor totalStress;
00757       communicator.Reduce(&localStress(0,0), &totalStress(0,0), 
00758                           Dimension*Dimension, MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00759       if (communicator.Get_rank() == 0) {
00760          setStress(totalStress);
00761       } else {
00762          unsetStress();
00763       }
00764       #else
00765       setStress(localStress);
00766       #endif
00767 
00768    }
00769 
00770 }
00771 #endif
